participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, Emily dreams big and loves to explore new ideas.
participant_1.background: My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up. I have a poster of Neil Tyson Degrasse on my wall. Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Confident and competitive, Lucas enjoys challenges and values his independence.
participant_2.background: Coffee is important to me. I don't like feeling obligated to hang out with someone. I can tell right away if I'm going to like someone. I love winning.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of Penn and Teller.
Me too! They're my favorite magicians.
I love how they always play up their rivalry.
Me too! It's so funny.
Have you seen their show "Penn & Teller: Fool Us"?
Yeah, I love that show! It's so much fun to see them try to figure out how the magicians are doing their tricks.
Me too! I always try to figure it out, but I never can.
Me neither! They're so good at what they do.
Have you ever tried to do magic?
No, I'm not very good at it.
Me neither! I've tried a few times, but I've never been able to figure it out.
I'm sure you could do it if you practiced.
Maybe! I'll have to give it a try.
Good luck!
Thanks!
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
Me too! I love to read and write. I don't play video games very much, though.
I love reading science fiction and fantasy novels.
Me too! I love those genres.
I also like to read non-fiction books about history, science, and politics.
Me too! I love learning new things.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
